Name: Average time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Manuscript Export Succeeded in the final stage of accepted manuscripts
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time it takes First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to be followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch across all variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average time until First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurs after First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total resolution time of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation measured as the duration between First Look-Your updates are overdue and First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to the next Manuscript Export Succeeded, compared with the average time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to its subsequent Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time between First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation and Awaiting Assignment to Batch in variants that lead to acceptance
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Total time it takes First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to be followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch in the variant ending with Manuscript Export Succeeded after acceptance
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Average waiting time to First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation after First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in the context of revised manuscript processing workflows
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Elapsed time between First Look-Your updates are overdue and First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation across all process variants containing both activities
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time for First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation when preceded by First Look-Your updates are overdue versus when preceded by First Look-Your updates are due in one week
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'First Look-Your updates are overdue' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time from First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation to the final Manuscript Export Succeeded in accepted revision pathways
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time it takes Awaiting Assignment to Batch to occur after First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in high-performance variants (performance < median)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Time of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation measured as the timestamp difference from the initial Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation in multi-round revision cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'
